channel.title: [pi] Score Board[pi]
channel.description:
I got a interface with text that says qj1 qj2 qj3 qj4 ect all the way down how do i clear all this text and make it where it list the people online with the most pk kills in order and saying how many kills they got.
this is what my friend gave me [code]
public void highscores() { clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8144); // Title sendQuest("@dre@ (¯`·._.·´¯`·->Top Pkers< -·´¯`·._.·´¯) ", 8145); for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { // you also need to change this for it to // display more, simply the number you // want it to display, say 20 = for(int // i = 0; i < 20; i++) if (server.ranks[i] > 0) { sendQuest("@bla@Rank " + (i + 1) + ": @red@" + server.rankPpl[i] + "@bla@ - Kills:@whi@ " + server.ranks[i], 8147 + i); } } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); resetRanks(); } [/code]
but this is the error i get [code] src\server\model\players\Client.java:90: cannot find symbol symbol : method clearQuestInterface() location: class server.model.players.Client clearQuestInterface(); ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:91: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendQuest(java.lang.String,int) location: class server.model.players.Client sendQuest("@dbl@", 8144); // Title ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:92: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendQuest(java.lang.String,int) location: class server.model.players.Client sendQuest("@dre@ (»`╖._.╖┤»`╖->Top Pkers< -╖┤»`╖._.╖┤») ", 8145) ; ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:97: cannot find symbol symbol : variable server location: class server.model.players.Client if (server.ranks[i] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:99: cannot find symbol symbol : variable server location: class server.model.players.Client + server.rankPpl[i] + "@bla@ - K ills:@whi@ " ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:100: cannot find symbol symbol : variable server location: class server.model.players.Client + server.ranks[i], 8147 + i); ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:98: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendQuest(java.lang.String,int) location: class server.model.players.Client sendQuest("@bla@Rank " + (i + 1) + ": @red@" ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:103: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendQuestSomething(int) location: class server.model.players.Client sendQuestSomething(8143); ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:104: cannot find symbol symbol : method showInterface(int) location: class server.model.players.Client showInterface(8134); ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: cannot find symbol symbol : method resetRanks() location: class server.model.players.Client resetRanks(); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 10 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
my pk kills is [code] pkKills [/code]

item.title: [pi] Score Board[pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

I got a interface with text that says
qj1
qj2
qj3
qj4
ect all the way down how do i clear all this text and make it where it list the people online with the most pk kills in order and saying how many kills they got.

this is what my friend gave me


public void highscores() {
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("@dbl@", 8144); // Title
		sendQuest("@dre@ (¯`·._.·´¯`·->Top Pkers< -·´¯`·._.·´¯) ", 8145);
		for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { // you also need to change this for it to
			// display more, simply the number you
			// want it to display, say 20 = for(int
			// i = 0; i < 20; i++)
			if (server.ranks[i] > 0) {
				sendQuest("@bla@Rank " + (i + 1) + ": @red@"
						+ server.rankPpl[i] + "@bla@ - Kills:@whi@ "
						+ server.ranks[i], 8147 + i);
			}
		}
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		showInterface(8134);
		flushOutStream();
		resetRanks();
	}

but this is the error i get
